commentBody:
I'm not a part of the bro culture, but I fail to find evidence in this piece that there's any harm in it. It seems the writer is simply uncomfortable with white men, especially groups of them hanging out with each other, and looking for any excuse to find objection to it, no matter how trivial. The attempt to tie any of this to the Sanders campaign seems particularly absurd.

Wesley, I would be interested in reading your think piece on confronting your own biases and knee-jerk discomfort to groups of white men in baseball caps. Is it really much different from the white guy who fears a group of young black men wearing hoodies?
